title: Climate Change Could Lead to Financial Crisis
itunes:title: Climate Change Could Lead to Financial Crisis
description:
Author Eugene Linden discusses his book Fire and Flood: A People’s History of Climate Change, from 1979 to the Present.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
